oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The Sewerage of Memphis, U.S.A.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: sewers; sewer system; sanitation; infrastructure; public works; maps;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: On September 23, 1880, George E. Waring, Jr. presented his paper to the Sanitary Institute of Great Britain's 1880 meeting. An excerpt of his paper, along with an abstract of the discussion that followed, was printed with permission of the council in 1881. Includes a map of the city sewers and illustrations.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: George Edwin Waring, Jr.
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: London, Offices of the Institute (The Sanitary Institute of Great Britain)
oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: Henry C. Burdett, F.S.S., and F. de Chaumont, M.D., F.R.S., editors
